channel.title: Need help with creativescape client (change client ip)
channel.description:
okay well when ever i login to the server creative scape it says last login from ip "127.0.0.1" and i know that's local host, so how do i change the 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip
(please tell me if this is in the wrong category) my msn is : heatrn11@hotmail.com
